attributes.action: sack Ann and Alan Keen for the corrupt moneygrabbers they are
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Any MP who claims £40,000 from the public purse for a second home in London that is 10 miles from their main home is obviously contemptuous of any sense of the spirit of the allowances system and is clealy on the take for personal means. For a husband and wife to collude to defraud the taxpayers is completely unforgivable. Repaying is insufficient. These thieves must be sacked.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
